subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Stephon Marbury scored a game-high 34 on 11 of 16 shooting to lead the Knicks, who have alternated wins and losses in their past 11 games, to a victory Friday night.
snippet: Stephon Marbury scored a game-high 34 on 11 of 16 shooting to lead the Knicks, who have alternated wins and losses in their past 11 games, to a victory Friday night.
